bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: Remove all uses of Eclipse Collections
bug.description:
This library does not work with Android and should be removed. DataVec is handled here (see also for discussion): <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/DataVec/pull/575>deeplearning4j/DataVec#575</denchmark-link>
We have other uses in DL4J (UI) and Arbiter, mainly for the primitive collections. Either we switch those to another implementation, or we look at implementing some in nd4j-common.

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
